Class Dimension ¶

Synopsis

Functions
dimension.id() 
0 = Overworld
1 = Nether
2 = TheEnd
dimension.name() 
Overworld
Nether
TheEnd
dimension.time()

The time in the dimension ranges from 0 to 1, 0 is the start of the day 0.5 is night and 1 is the end of the day will wrap to 0
dimension.isRaining()

Will return true if it is currently raining
dimension.sound()

Plays a sound at these coordinates
dimension.id() ¶ 
0 = Overworld
1 = Nether
2 = TheEnd
dimension.name() ¶ 
Overworld
Nether
TheEnd
dimension.time() ¶

The time in the dimension ranges from 0 to 1, 0 is the start of the day 0.5 is night and 1 is the end of the day will wrap to 0

dimension.isRaining() ¶

Will return true if it is currently raining

dimension.sound(x, y, z, name) ¶

Plays a sound at these coordinates
